main event: A bright white colored UFO was observed slowly descending towards the ground in Los Angeles, California on February 12, 1967.
interesting points: The object was much brighter than the surrounding sky., The descent rate of the object was too slow to be classified as a comet., A witness remained visible behind the descending object., The length of observation was between 1-2 minutes., There was no physical evidence or photographs taken of the sighting.
